tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE genetic_data (
 sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 proj_id INT,
 genotype VARCHAR(10),
 phenotype VARCHAR(20),
 FOREIGN KEY (proj_id) REFERENCES population_genetics(proj_id)
);

CREATE TABLE research_team (
 team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 team_name VARCHAR(50),
 team_lead VARCHAR(50),
 team_size INT,
 proj_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (proj_id) REFERENCES population_genetics(proj_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PopulationGenetics (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_name VARCHAR(255),
  population_size INT,
  founder_population_id INT,
  creation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE FounderPopulation (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  founder_species_name VARCHAR(255),
  founder_population_size INT,
  founder_population_location VARCHAR(255),
  creation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE GeneticMutation (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  mutation_type VARCHAR(255),
  mutation_effect VARCHAR(255),
  mutation_frequency FLOAT,
  creation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ExperimentResults (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_name VARCHAR(255),
  experiment_date DATE,
  population_id INT,
  mutation_id INT,
  result_summary TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Individuals (
	id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	species_id INT REFERENCES Species(id),
	individual_id INT NOT NULL,
	gender VARCHAR(10),
	color VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Projects (
	id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	project_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
	project_description TEXT,
	start_date DATE,
	end_date DATE
);
